subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|p}}: from a pictograph of a pregnant woman.

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|身%体|しん%たい}}: body
* {{ja-r|身%長|しん%ちょう}}: stature, one's [[height]]
* {{ja-r|身%辺|しん%ぺん}}: one's person
* {{ja-r|身%代|しん%だい}}: one's fortune, one's property
* {{ja-r|身%代わり|み%がわり}}: a [[stand-in]], a [[substitute]]
* {{ja-r|身%軽|み%がる}}: [[agile]], [[nimble]], [[light on one's feet]]
* {{ja-r|身%形|み%なり}}: one's appearance
* {{ja-r|身%近|み%ぢか}}: [[close]] by, [[near]]; [[familiar]]
* {{ja-r|身%元|み%もと}}: identity
* {{ja-r|身%柄|み%がら}}: social standing
* {{ja-r|身%分|み%ぶん}}: social position
* {{ja-r|身%寄り|み%より}}: relative
* {{ja-r|身%投げ|み%なげ}}: suicide
* {{ja-r|身%障%者|しん%しょう%しゃ}}: disabled person
* {{ja-r|身 の 上|み の うえ}}: one's circumstances, one's place in life, one's lot or fortune
* {{ja-r|身%勝%手|み%がっ%て}}: [[selfishness]]
* {{ja-r|身 の 程|み の ほど}}: one's social position
* {{ja-r|身 の 回り|み の まわり}}: one's accoutrements, the things about a person, one's personal belongings
* {{ja-r|全%身|ぜん%しん}}: whole body
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|心%身|しん%しん}}: mind and body
* {{ja-r|焼%身|しょう%しん}}: self-immolation
* {{ja-r|変%身|へん%しん}}: transformation
* {{ja-r|自%身|じ%しん}}: oneself
* {{ja-r|独%身|どく%しん}}: living alone; a [[bachelor]], a [[single]] [[person]]
* {{ja-r|単%身|たん%しん}}: alone, one person
* {{ja-r|前%身|ぜん%しん}}: past life
* {{ja-r|保%身|ほ%しん}}: self-protection
* {{ja-r|献%身|けん%しん}}: devotion
* {{ja-r|立%身|りっ%しん}}: success in life
* {{ja-r|小%身|しょう%しん}}: humble position
* {{ja-r|細%身|ほそ%み}}: a narrow body {{qualifier|as of a person or the body of a thing}}
* {{ja-r|中%身|なか%み}}: [[contents]], the [[insides]] of something
* {{ja-r|黄%身|き%み}}: [[yolk]]
* {{ja-r|刺%身|さし%み}}: [[sashimi]]
* {{ja-r|出%身%地|しゅっ%しん%ち}}: one's native place, where someone is from
* {{ja-r|身 に 着ける|み に つける}}: to [[wear]], to [[put on]] the body
* {{ja-r|一%身|いっ%しん}}: the own person, oneself
* {{ja-r|一%身|ひと%み}}: the entire body
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology 1
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|み}}

# a [[body]]; {{lb|ja|by extension}}:
## the [[main]] part of something
## the [[blade]] of a [[sword]]
## [[oneself]]
## one's [[position]], one's [[social]] [[standing]] or [[circumstances]]
## [[meat]], [[flesh]]
## [[wood]] {{qualifier|emphasis on the inside, as opposed to the bark}}

subSections.title: Derived terms
Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|む}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=む}}. Bound form of ''mi'' above, only found in compounds.

subSections.title: Derived terms
Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|むくろ}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=むくろ}}. Compound of {{compound|ja|sort=むくろ|身|tr1=mu|t1=body|pos1=bound form of standalone ''mi''|くろ|tr2=kuro}}. The derivation of the ''kuro'' element is uncertain, but it might be an alteration or ancient form of {{m|ja|幹|tr=kara||trunk, main part}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

subSections.title: Noun
Derived terms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|身%籠|むくろ%ごめ}}, {{ja-r|躯%籠|むくろ%ごめ}}: one's [[entire]] [[body]]

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: Seldom used on its own. In isolation, the reading ''mi'' is much more common.

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|身%体|しん%たい}}: a [[body]], one's body
